titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the terms of office for Members of Congress.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S626)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits a Member of the House of Representatives from serving more than six full terms in the House and a Senator from serving more than two full terms in the Senate (excluding any part of a partial term to which the person may have been elected or appointed).
